thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com
thread.title: Bengt
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Bengt

author: Bengt
title: Bengt
text:
Munich Ski Shuttle delivered excellent transport service!
We had to wait 7 hours at Munich airport because of delayed luggage. Munich Ski Shuttle postponed the shuttle accordingly. After arrival of the dalayed luggage Munich Ski Shuttle delivered the 320 kilometer shuttle - without any exstra charge!
